section.title: Purpose
section.p: EqfExportFolderFP exports a folder to a specific path.
This function performs the export in small units. Call it repetitively until it returns a return code other than CONTINUE_RC.

row.entry: The EQF session handle, as returned by EqfStartSession.
The name of the folder to be exported.
The path to which the folder is exported.

The options to be used for the export:
WITHMEM_OPT WITHREADONLYMEM_OPT WITHDOCMEM_OPT DELETE_OPT WITHDICT_OPT MASTERFOLDER_OPT XLIFF_OPT OVERWRITE_OPT
These options correspond to those in the Export Folder window (see ).
You can combine the constants using OR.
The name of one or more documents.
The folder export has not completed yet. Call EqfExportFolderFP again.

entry.ph: Error code (EQF message number). Use EqfGetLastError (see page ) to retrieve the complete error information.
Error code (EQF message number). Use to retrieve the complete error information.

example.title: Code sample
